background: Wise wizard with a penchant for slipping worms into his companions' morning oats

background: Daydreams during the day, dreams during the night. This man is unreal because he is a fictional example of a character you can create.
head: /assets/images/head/head2.png

background: Once a night guard at the royal palace, this man heard the call of adventure and now roams the country slaying beasts and digging wells for the wealthy.
head: /assets/images/head/head3.png

background: This ancient automaton unearthed from some forgotten ruins does not feel. It does not eat. It does not rest. What little scholars have been able to learn about it is a partial plaque declaring it "in the house".
head: /assets/images/head/head4.png
